creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: from a suite of 13 color lithographs housed in a beige linen portfolio box, titled by hand individually by the artist, with an acrylic sumi ink wash; man seated in chair, looking left; smoking

title: Forgiving, from "Lilacs and Smoke"
